title: # The general rule for employees’ expenses: specific expenses

details.body:
# The general rule for employees’ expenses: specific expenses

Assistants wages[EIM32410](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32410) Blind employee's guide dog[EIM32430](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32430) Books[EIM32435](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM32435.htm) Car washing[EIM32440](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32440) Child minding or other domestic expenses[EIM32445](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32445) Clothing[EIM32450](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32450) Club subscriptions[EIM32500](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32500) Cost of living[EIM32505](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32505) Director's expenses[EIM32510](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32510) Dirty money[EIM32515](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32515) Education and training[EIM32520](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32520) Employment agency fees[EIM32560](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32401#EIM32560) Entertaining[EIM32565](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32400#EIM32565) Chargeable overseas earnings; corresponding payments[EIM32661](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32661) Flat rate expenses[EIM32700](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32700) Home: working from home[EIM32760](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32760) Interest[EIM32860](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32860) Legal costs[EIM32865](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM31651#EIM32865) Medical expenses[EIM32870](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32870) Meetings of trade or professional associations[EIM31945](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM31800#EIM31945) Motor car expenses[EIM31330](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM31200#EIM31330) Overseas conferences, seminars and study tours[EIM31950](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM31800#EIM31950) Professional membership fees and annual subscriptions[EIM32880](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32880) Professional person's expenses[EIM32930](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32930) Telephone charges[EIM32940](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM32940.htm) Trade Union subscriptions[EIM32885](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32700CT#EIM32885) Travel expenses – general[EIM31800](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM31800) Travel expenses – employees using their own vehicle or bicycle for 2002/03 onwards[EIM31200](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM31200) Travel expenses – travel in the performance of the duties[EIM32350](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32350) Travel expenses – travel for necessary attendance[EIM32000](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM32000)
